p.b: Great week for MIPS users: a new LiveCD for SGI and stages for Cobalt servers open this issue of the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. The officially release Openoffice finds its fans among Gentooists, and a short trick tells you what to do in case packages need rebuilding after a kernel upgrade. Also in this edition: Gentoo in the press, lots of security announcements, and the bugzilla statistics. Have fun reading this week's GWN!
